name: Armada Engine (Canceled)
blurb: A fun, colorful, multiplayer action RPG from the developers of Armada for Dreamcast--that you can help playtest right now!

rewards.reward: EXPLORER:  Gain access to the Beta, and a digital download of the full final release game.  Receive backer desktops and a digital art book covering early alien designs, production sketches, concept art, and high res renders of our 3D aliens.  All backers will be given credit in the game and our sincere thanks for their help in making this project a reality.

CAPTAIN:  Digital download of all updates and expansions.  Digital download of the musical score, special player portrait options, and an animated art pack, plus early access to the remake of Armada 1 (when we get to that).  [+all above rewards.]

SURVIVOR:  Gain early access to Tier 4 ship upgrades.  Gain early access to the release server.  Your account will be added to the SuperTester list, and be backed up on three backup servers.  We do not plan on purging test accounts, but this one account will for certain not be purged.  [+all above rewards.]

ELITE:  Upgrade one account to an Elite account.  Elite accounts have 6 extra character slots and an optional Commander flag that can be activated when logging in.  Commanders can choose to appear on a dedicated page of the friends list seen by all players.  [+all above rewards.]

DEVELOPER:  Receive digital 3D models and special effects art resources from AO, plus all art assets from Armada Arcade (android).  If you want to develop a mobile or flash game and have at least one programmer on your team, we will help you complete a commercial game using our art and music resources (if you want), at our discretion and within reason.  If multiple people sign up for this and are interested, we can help you collaborate and share data.  [+all above rewards.]

PATRON:  Receive currently unreleased mobile client/server source code capable of supporting a game similar to Armada Online.  We will help you get your game made.  This is an unlimited mobile client server code license.  It can be used for a wide variety of multiplayer game types.  You can use it to make an infinite number of games without any further cost.  You do not need to give us credit in your game if you are just using our server code.  [+all above rewards.]

BOOSTER:  Talk to us about what custom reward you might like.  In addition to whatever you have in mind, I can do a high res digital game character painting of you based on photo references you send me.  You can become a character in the campaign missions if you want.  [+all above rewards, including Patron code license.]
